abstract: A pending $3.6 billion transfer of spectrum will give Comcast, the nation’s largest cable company, a presence in select Verizon Wireless retail locations, where Comcast salesmen will offer Verizon customers special offers if they sign up for the cable company’s Xfinity service.

lead_paragraph: Customers walking into a Verizon Wireless store in Portland, Ore., or Seattle this week may notice something unusual: cable salesmen.

headline.main: New in Your Wireless Store: The Cable Guy
